summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 726 m), and light levels (up 6064 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1673 m), and light levels (up 7991 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 725.9m lower than yesterday, 644.2m lower than the past week, 1672.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 998.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
